Omg We Bought A Bus

2018-07-28 00:00:00 +0100 - Will

Well… Today we got a quick train to Sheringham. Why? Because we were going to buy a bus! As it happened, there was a fair bit of nasty rain around, so when we arrived it was great to find Simon from @RetroCampersNorfolk waiting to give us a lift. But I suppose we were about to hand over £[REDACTED] so perhaps a free taxi ride wasn’t so much to expect.

And some more…
